feed.title: [Bitcoin Advent Calendar] A Defense of Having Fun (and maybe staying poor)

entry.title: [Bitcoin Advent Calendar] A Defense of Having Fun (and maybe staying poor)
entry.summary: In a recent post by Jeremy Rubin, he speaks about having fun every now and then as a treat. The post is less technical and more philosophical in nature, which has garnered positive feedback from the readers. Rubin mentions that he will continue to syndicate the remaining posts to this list based on the private feedback he has received from more than one person. The link to the post is provided for those interested in reading it. Overall, it appears to be a lighthearted message encouraging readers to take time to enjoy themselves amidst their work and responsibilities.
